ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron had enough of this, there was no way he could get to the pod in time, and his enemies were beginning to suspect something. He turned to Waspinator,

Subject: Neo Beast Wars

    Megatron had enough of this, there was no way he could get to the pod in 
time, and his enemies were beginning to suspect something. He turned to 
Waspinator, "You, go to Kitkats position and beg for he to spare a body part 
of mine to you, as a momento. Tell her that I am truly dead, but under any 
circumstances do not tell them that we are residing in the ice cavern."
He said.
    Waspinator nodded. "Yes Megatron. But what if they hurt me?" He said a 
little uneasy.
    "Thats your problem. Just throw them off my trail!" He roared and sent 
the little bot buzzing away frantically into the air.
    Adrax began to clap and got the tyrants attention. "What a perfect prison 
you have selected. If you leave, you'll die. And now your confined insdie. 
You are pathetic Megatron."
    Without a word, Megatron dropped his cage into the pit, but stopped it. 
It dangled in blackness. Megatron then sealed the top of it. He could stay 
down there awhile.

    Hell Beast and Gremlin emerged from the woods. Word had it that Megatron 
was dead, and if he was then he could go home. Gremlin pointed as they 
entered the clearing to the old cave, "There they are. Kitkat is in charge."
    The old Commander looked at the leader. She was small, another female. 
Females seemed to be weak leaders, but mabey this one was different. 
"Commander Kitkat, I am Senator Hell Beast. I belive my reputation proceeds 
me, but in any case I have come to investigate the death of the criminal 
Megatron. I mean no trouble and will help you if nessecery."

    Black Aracnia looked to Quickstrike, "So what do you think about the 
baby....I mean...are you alright with it? Scared?"
